name: Jumpster (itch)
description:
I've created this project as a way to take the first steps into game developing, putting together what I've learnt of Godot's Game Engine.  This game is still in-development as it's something i spend 1-2hrs a night working on, I will be regularly updating this page with every new update.

Currently have set up 10 different levels varying in design and mechanics. I'm looking to create 10-20 more levels to the game to make a finished project. I would appreciate any feedback that you have or any improvement suggestions! 

This is my first ever project so I do apologise if there are issues, I will fix them quickly just let me know.

It’s inspired by Mario style platformers, push yourself to set the highest score you can, you only get 75 lives before it’s game over an you try again! 

Controls are 

right: D

Left: A

Jump: W

Interact: Space 

Pause: P
